channel.title: Message to all

item.title: Message to all
item.dc:creator: @Macko11 Macko11
item.description:
@Macko11 wrote:

hey guys, i was wondering if someone could help here it wont take long as i have done most of it its just when i put it in npchandler i get an error. what i want to do is when you kill the minigames last level monster i want it to say player name has slain â€¦ this is what ive got

[code] if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3499) {
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];

                            ppl.teleportToX = 2721;
                            ppl.teleportToY = 4908;
                        {
                        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Everyone " +playerName+ " Has Just Slain The Gelatinnoth Mother and Will Go To Receive Their Reward";
                        }[/code]

but when i compile it says it cannot find symbol playerName bearing in mind its in npchandler so it might be a different variable if someone knows could you please help it would be greatly appreciated

Read full topic
